entry.title: CSSconfeu
entry.content:
It was great to attend the CSSconfeu. Thanks to Rails Girls Summer of Code and cssconfeu organizers for offering me a free ticket. Wheeee. Some talks were too advanced for me to understand (e.g. “Mind-blowing Power of Sass 3.3.” by Chris Eppstein) but the intro by Jed Schmidt, Nicole Sullivan, Razvan Caliman (CSS shapes & regions) and Rachel Nabors (animation) were really enjoyable, also for a beginner.

Edit: Here is the wonderful and funny intro by Jed:
